1) In Science & Society, I write posts on topics - Public Policy, Economics, General Science, Psychology, Book Reviews/Summaries etc., with my posts, I’ll bring to you a compendium of latest developments, thought provoking concepts, arguments & shall aid in connecting them.

4) In Connecting Collector, I post my daily answer-writings as an account of my answer-writings to track my progress, I can see Connecting Collector becoming a comprehensive resource on answer-writing for UPSC Aspirants & also as a good collection to the General Audience, who are genuinely interested in knowing the contours of development of India, as a nation & society.
